title: LF Diamond 5's Ranked Team | Mid Main
body: Looking for a team that is actually ranked Diamond. Add me in game.

replies.body:
Proceed with caution; this guy is known for scripting, and is scripting.
Having him in your ranked 5s team could potentially get you all banned for abusing his scripts to earn a rank.

> [{quoted}](name=Kyuza,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=xf88KInr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-12T15:02:18.544+0000)
>
> I remember you from somewhere...

I was probably a troll from GD?
